text: Congratulations!!! Awesome! Opps or happened. How did it go?
And what kind of questions did they ask you?

It was a first stage interview, they asked me why i am not pursuing languages or marketing as a career(because of my current work position and the languages i speak), if i know what the job entails what i know about the company . (I did a LOT of research) and i asked them about career progression and pay.

The job role doesn’t sound very appealing :sweat_smile: but getting my foot in the door.... I haven’t heard back since Wednesday,  i will send a follow-up email tomorrow at noon-ish. I am also working on matchmove with modelbuilder in nuke and some keying practice . I am reading ‘digital compositing with Nuke 101’ and trying to learn about colour correction
